spec.name: Paquet Roundabout
spec.description: Paquet Roundabout (Rond-Point Paquet) is a major traffic circle and urban landmark in the central commercial district of Casablanca. Named after a prominent figure or company (likely from the French Protectorate era), the roundabout is a key intersection, directing traffic across important avenues. It features a central island, often decorated with greenery or a monument, serving as a visual focal point in the urban landscape.
